gamerule.spawnChunkRadius.description: Amount of chunks that stay loaded around the overworld spawn position.
boring_spawn_chunks.modmenu_screen.title: Game Rule Configurability Warning
boring_spawn_chunks.modmenu_screen.messa:
Due to the goal being only adding the game rule, Boring Spawn Chunks doesn't provide configurable defaults by itself!

Use Boring Default Game Rules in order to configure not only this mod's game rules but also its sibling from 1.20.5!
